description:
North Ambria State is on high alert after receiving a demand for reparations from the Erebonian Empire. However, Master Glark has a plan, and it involves archaisms, a hero`s grandchild, and previously undisclosed ambitions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le château immaculé le temps d`une décision
Pale White Castle at a Crossroads
決意の間, 白茶けた城下
